post.body: wrong!
MK, you DO rock!
In Chattanooga, getting ready to go to dinner
Getting ready to fly to Chattanooga, wondering what the weather is like
Looking to get corporations involved in this cause. Let me know your thoughts: http://www.ranchofeliz.com/Default.aspx

Go for it, Marilyn
Would Jesus pass muster with the Obama team? Check it out: http://tinyurl.com/57vkqs
Managing new online forum on corporate citizenship. Want to join? Check it out: http://tinyurl.com/5lyybk
Gearing up for an exciting election day. Let's hope everyone gets to vote in a timely fashion. I've already voted.
Yardwork - after watching the football Cardinals snatch defeat from the jaws of victory once again
learning how to post from Twitter to Facebook (I think!)
Just posted a blog on the Zonie Report: http://tinyurl.com/57vkqs
McCain's going negative and personal because it's all he's got left in the arsenal. It's over, folks
Relaxed and relieved after a great ZooFari 2008. If you attended, thanks!
Just published an article about religion in Arizona: http://tinyurl.com/5258w5
ZooFari tomorrow night. Great restaurants, great acts, great raffles and auctions Buy tickets today: www.phoenixzoo.org/events/zoofari
I'm with you, JoePRguy!
Appearing between 9 and 10 a.m. tomorrow on Ch. 13, Phoenix. Pat McMahon show to talk about Zoofari. It happens Friday night!
On the final strokes for Phoenix ZooFari. Phoenicians, come! Or buy a raffle ticket or a silent auction item: http://tiny.cc/PHXZoo
Great to see the Cardinals win a playoff game
Peter, birdman had no birds at alcatraz
Learning to use my new iPod Touch
May you all have a wonderful Christmas!
